snippet: Europe is under pressure to make private-sector investors pay a bigger share of the bill for bailing out Cyprus than in past bailouts. But Cyprus has other priorities.
abstract: European leaders are under pressure to make private-sector investors pay a bigger share of the bill for bailing out Cyprus than in past bailouts.
lead_paragraph: Europe is under pressure to make private-sector investors pay a bigger share of the bill for bailing out Cyprus than in past bailouts. But Cyprus has other priorities.

headline.seo: In Cyprus Bailout, Questions Over Who Should Shoulder the Bill
headline.main: In Cyprus Bailout, Questions of Whether Depositors Should Shoulder the Bill
headline.print_headline: In Cyprus Bailout, Questions of Whether Depositors Should Shoulder the Bill
